description:
Spacious and light-filled apartment with views of the river. Close to Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts,  Columbus Circle, Central Park, great dining and shopping. Good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Closest subway is the 1,2,3 at 66th St. Lincoln Center or 72nd St.

There is parking associated with the building, and you pay upon leaving the garage.
name: UWS - Spacious & Sunny 2 bedroom apartment
review:
Very simply, as advertised: "spacious and sunny". Beautiful view of Hudson in a safe location and upscale building. The host is professional and quick to reply. 
I'll certainly be returning when in NYC!
